tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been consulting Dr Akram for more than 16 years for my daughters. He is a very good Pediatrician, nice person and well experienced doctor. All the tests, medications, prescriptions and suggestions have always helped. It is rare to get such a Doctor who continuously helps with his experience, identifies cause perfectly, treats with acumen-ship and is kind at heart.
Thank you Doctor! It’s always easy and so friendly to consult doctor Akram and he suggested medication are focused on root of the problem with appropriate treatment.
I take appointment for my son,when i went appolo clinic,doctor was not there,** * **** ** ********* *** *** ****** ** **** ****
